global proc liquidAddTabs (   ) 
 

global proc string liquidmayaGetCommonGlobalValue (  string $  global  ) 
 

This procedure is called when the current renderer has changed from Liquid to another renderer. Returns the value of the common global specified by $global.

Returns:
value of the specified common global, as a string.

global proc int liquidmayaHasCommonGlobalValue (  string $  global  ) 
 

This procedure is called when the current renderer has changed from Liquid renderer to some other renderer. It is called during the process of copying common globals from Liquid to a new current renderer. This procedure tells the caller whether the value of the specified $global can be provided by the liquidGetCommonGlobalValue() procedure.

Returns:
a boolean (int) value

global proc liquidmayaSetCommonGlobalValue (  string $  global,
string $  value
) 
 

This procedure is called when the current renderer has changed from some other renderer to Liquid. It is called in the process of copying common global values from the previous renderer to Liquid. This procedure sets the value of the global specified by $global to the value specified by $value.

global proc liquidRenderLogoCallback (   ) 
 

This procedure is run everytime someone clicks the logo button in the unified render globals window. If LIQUIDHELP is set, it will open a web browser with to the address it contains. Otherwise, it will take you to the liquidWiki page.
